variables.name: letter-spacing-tighter
variables.description: Display Headers: For H1/H2 over 40px to prevent a "gappy" look.

variables.name: letter-spacing-tight
variables.description: Tightens tracking for headings and display text (24px+) to improve optical balance and density.

variables.name: letter-spacing-base
variables.description: Standard Body: Default for paragraphs to ensure maximum legibility.

variables.name: letter-spacing-wide
variables.description: Small Labels: For buttons, tags, or small all-caps text.

variables.name: letter-spacing-wider
variables.description: Technical/Accent: For tiny captions or "Eyebrow" headers
